name: Witness (raidr)
description:
All you have to do is witness us.

Stay with us, listen to us.

Traverse an eerie environment and discover the tragedy that has unfolded in this small village. Don't attempt to understand what happened, just witness what has happened.

PLEASE USE HEADPHONES FOR BEST EXPERIENCE (3D Audio) WARNING: This game features detailed blood and gore, partial nudity and distressing audio. PROCEED AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION.
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Created by Leo Laughlin Developed in Unity (HDRP) LATEST BUILD: V0.2

(Added Night Mode + Resolution/Frame-Rate Fix)

Assets: 3D
